config.title.interactiveEmote.name: Interactive Emotes Settings
config.delay.name: Emote Delay
config.delay.tooltip: Delay in milliseconds before NPCs react to your emotes. 1000 is recommended.
config.distance.name: Interaction Distance
config.distance.tooltip: Distance in tiles within which characters will react.
config.title.friendship.name: Friendship Settings
config.friendship.amount.name: Friendship Gain
config.friendship.amount.tooltip: How many friendship points to gain when an NPC responds to your emote (1 Heart = 250 points). Set to 0 to disable this function.
config.friendship.notify.name: Show Friendship Gain Message
config.friendship.notify.tooltip: If true, show a message when friendship is gained from an emote.
config.title.playsound.name: Sound Settings
config.sound.name: Play Sound After Reply
config.sound.tooltip: If enabled, a sound effect will play after a character replies with an emote.
config.title.emotecombo.name: Emote Combo Settings
config.emotecombo.name: Enable Emote Combos
config.emotecombo.tooltip: A feature that makes NPCs react when you use the same emote repeatedly.
config.combo.mode.name: Combo Count Mode
config.combo.mode.tooltip: Choose how the combo trigger count is determined. 'PerCombo' uses values from emote-reactions.json. 'Fixed' uses the global value below.
config.combo.global_target.name: Global Combo Target
config.combo.global_target.tooltip: The number of emotes needed for a combo when mode is 'Fixed', or as a fallback for 'PerCombo'.
config.combo.timeout.name: Combo Timeout
config.combo.timeout.tooltip: The time in game ticks before a combo resets. 60 ticks = 1 second.
config.title.rules.name: Rule Engine Condition Settings
config.rules.weather.name: Enable Weather Conditions
config.rules.weather.tooltip: If enabled, the 'Weather' condition in emote-reactions.json will be checked.
config.rules.season.name: Enable Season Conditions
config.rules.season.tooltip: If enabled, the 'Season' condition in emote-reactions.json will be checked.
config.rules.friendship.name: Enable Friendship Conditions
config.rules.friendship.tooltip: If enabled, friendship-related conditions in emote-reactions.json will be checked.
combo.npc.Question: What's up?
combo.npc.Question2: Is there something you want to ask?
combo.npc.manylove.withlover: This is kind of embarrassing, you know...
combo.npc.manylove.withnotlover3: Huh? A love confession? But we just met.
combo.npc.manySleep2: Should we go take a nap?
combo.npc.manyHappy2: You're smiling so much your cheeks might pop~
combo.npc.manyHappy3: You seem to be in a great mood today!
combo.npc.manyHappy.normal2: What's up? I've seen you smiling all day.
combo.npc.manySayNo3: I understand. Okay, sorry to bother you.
combo.npc.manyHappyNote: You must be really happy today.
combo.npc.manyHappyNote2: Spreading sunshine today? Count me in~
combo.npc.manyHappyNote3: You’re in a good mood today, huh!
combo.npc.dosomethingManyTimes: Why are you doing that over and over?
combo.npc.manyGame1: Of course! I've been waiting for this~ What game?
combo.npc.manyGame2: Let's do it! Let me know when you're ready!
combo.npc.manyGame3: I'm free right now, let's play~
combo.npc.manyGame4: I'm not ready to play right now.|Maybe some other time, okay?
combo.npc.manySurprised2: What are you so surprised about?
combo.npc.new.manyYes1: I'm so glad you never say no. Thank you, really.
reaction.npc.angry.friend2: You seem to be in a bad mood today.
reaction.npc.sick.spouse1: You don't look well... Is something wrong? |You can tell me anything, don't push yourself.
reaction.npc.sick.spouse2: Are you really okay, @? You look so pale. |I'm worried.
reaction.npc.sick.spouse3: Don't push yourself. |If you're not feeling well |just rest, I'm here for you.
reaction.npc.sick.friend1: Hey... You alright? |You don't look so good. |Are you sure you're okay?
reaction.npc.sick.friend2: Don't overdo it. If you can't |just say so. I'll help you out.
reaction.npc.sick.friend3: Are you okay? If you're not |don't say you are!
reaction.npc.sick.default1: You look pale.|If you're not feeling well.|I can get someone to help.
reaction.npc.sick.default2: Are you alright, @? |You seem a little under the weather.
reaction.npc.sad.spouse1: Are you okay? |You can vent to me if you need to.
reaction.npc.sad.spouse2: Do you want a hug? |Just let me hold you for a while.
reaction.npc.sad.spouse3: I know you're strong|but you don't have to be strong alone all the time.
reaction.npc.sad.friend1: I hope you feel like smiling again soon.
reaction.npc.sad.friend2: I don't know what happened|but if you ever want to talk, I'm here to listen.
reaction.npc.sad.friend3: It's okay to not force a smile.|It's okay to be sad some days.
greeting.hi.friend2: Hiii~ Good to see you again~
greeting.hi.spouse2: I was just thinking about you.
greeting.hi.dateable1: Oh... @! What are you doing around here?
greeting.hi.dateable2: Hey! Nice weather today, isn't it?
greeting.hi.normal2: Hello there. Nice to see you.
